om.personarule.RuleCondition: <condition> <activity name="bizformsubmit"> <field name="ActivityItemID"> <value>##ACTIVITY_ITEM_ID##</value> </field> <field name="ActivityCreated"> <params> <seconddatetime>1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM</seconddatetime> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityURL"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityTitle"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityComment"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityUTMSource"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityUTMContent"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityCampaign"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> <field name="ActivityURLReferrer"> <params> <operator>0</operator> </params> </field> </activity> <wherecondition>(ActivityType='bizformsubmit') AND ([ActivityItemID] = ##ACTIVITY_ITEM_ID##)</wherecondition> </condition>
om.personarule.RuleDisplayName: Submitted the Allergy test center application form
